description: Currently, the Nova API server only allows creation of new key_pairs.  We have a need for importing users' pre-existing public keys.
title: Allow import of public keys

comments.content: Currently, the Nova API server only allows creation of new key_pairs.  We have a need for importing users' pre-existing public keys.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jtran
